name: (triethanolamine-perchlorate, sodium salt) dimer
SMLTrestrictions: G38 Group Restriction No. 38 corresponds to FCM substance No. 822,1080. Group restriction specification is expressed as perchlorate.
Restrictions: Only to be used in rigid poly (vinyl chloride) in contact with foods included in the food category with reference number 01.01.A in table 2 of Annex III.
NotesCompliance: V4a Compliance testing when there is a fat contact shall be performed using saturated fatty food simulants as simulant D2.
